entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
